title: "Gravity's Artistry"
content:
# Gravity's Artistry

Welcome to Gravity's Artistry, a website dedicated to showcasing the beauty and wonder of the universe through stunning digital art. Our main attraction is a captivating image of a black hole, expertly rendered to convey the extreme gravitational forces at play.

But that's just the beginning. Our collection features a variety of cosmic scenes, from distant galaxies to swirling nebulas. Each piece is carefully crafted to capture the awe-inspiring majesty of space.

Whether you're a seasoned astronomer or simply appreciate the beauty of the cosmos, we invite you to explore our gallery and immerse yourself in the wonders of the universe.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A digital image of a black hole, with the distorted shapes and bright colors representing the extreme gravity."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
